entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 4.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Greater Moncton Roméo LeBlanc Int'l Airport 6:00 PM ADT Thursday 4 May 2023

Visibility: 6 km

entry.title: Thursday night: Showers. Low plus 2.
